meanings.definition: A woman who owns and manages a business or property.
meanings.sent1: The proprietresses of the bakery work hard to ensure its success.
meanings.sent2: The proprietresses of the hotel greeted the guests with warm smiles.
meanings.sent3: The proprietresses of the farm decided to have a dance-off to settle a disagreement.
meanings.sent4: The proprietresses of the store are the queens of their domain.
meanings.sent5: The proprietresses of the salon have a keen eye for style.

meanings.definition: The female owner of a business or property.
meanings.sent1: As the proprietresses of the vineyard, they oversaw the grape harvest.
meanings.sent2: The proprietresses of the bookstore organized a book signing event.
meanings.sent3: The proprietresses of the mansion hosted a fancy dress party for their friends.
meanings.sent4: The proprietresses of the cafe brewed success with their unique coffee blends.
meanings.sent5: The proprietresses of the gallery curated a stunning art exhibition.
